title: Don Quixote [Nureyev]
creator_credit: International Arts, John L. Hargreaves, Rudolf Nureyev and Robert Helpmann
brief_description: Robert Helpmann plays the principle role of Don Quixote in this production which features the Australian Ballet and music by the State Orchestra of Victoria. Cast includes Ray Powell, Francis Croese and Colin Peasley. Also features a documentary on the making of the film, ‘A Little bit of Don Quixote’.
